About Me

I want to tell you a few things...

Biography

I am 23 years old. From Serbia, Belgrade. My journey starts when i was waitress and bartender. I was trying to learn programing as working every day. I wasn't satisfied with how much I was learning so I decide to quit and dedicate myself completle to web development. I was so happy when I make my first page. By making bigger and more compicated code feelings were more powerfull. And I fell in love completely. Since then I learned a lot but I am also aware of how much is there to learn and how much I still don't know. I strive to make web a beautiful place and try not to be to hard on myself if that day I didn't learn enought. Also passionate animal and nature lover.

Skils

HTML5

CSS3

SASS

JAVASCRIPT

ECMA6

BOOTSTRAP

My goals

In this moment I am improving all the code. I want it to be clean understandable code with newest features. Also, learning React, so i am at the begining of the journey of becoming a good developer with great skills. Main goal is to learn something new every day and make projects I would be proud of.
